entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Clearer additional method overloads for narrowing/widening a vector #113307
  • Add support for custom versions of libfuzzer-dotnet in fuzzing #113303
  • Invalid .NET 10 MissingMethodException with specific SDK versions #113302

Closed

  • Duplicate UDP socket bind not generating an error #36618
  • [API Proposal]: Let MemoryPool<T>.Shared.Rent support clear the data when return #96396
  • RSACng Decryption throwing Internal Error Occurred exception #97027
  • [API Proposal]: Add Missing methods to SubjectAlternativeNameBuilder Ex: AddDirectoryName #112069
  • [browser][io] Emscripten does not support file locking. #40065
  • ExpressionStringBuilder improvement request #113270

PullRequests

Created

  • Force write of local file header when "version needed to extract" changes #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [10.0/preview2] JIT: make array stack disable work in release builds #113305
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AreVNsEquivalent #113304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some more constant folding in lowering #113301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Apply hardware intrinsics to `BitArray.*Shift` #113299
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.35, windows: 134.0.6998.36 #113297
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Update `.comment` section #113255
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replace `Unsafe.As` with `Unsafe.Read{Write}Unaligned` #113293
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • OSDescription: Returns a user-friendly name instead of kernel info on Android & Apple platforms #113041
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-android, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Introduce `LclVarDsc::lvIsMultiRegDest` #113294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable `UseSizeOptimizedLinq` by default on native AOT #113214
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
